body_html:
True; the issue is related to the latest versions (as of the date of this post); CUDA 9.0 and previous cuDNNs work fine.
On Fri, 31 Aug 2018 at 20:06, Luis Jaraquemada ***@***.***> wrote: Yep good. The issue from my previous post arises when you want to use CUDA9.2 — You are receiving this because you commented.
